TypeSignature.Value: public class Tuple<T1,T2,T3,T4,T5,T6> : IComparable, System.Collections.IStructuralComparable, System.Collections.IStructuralEquatable

.class public auto ansi serializable beforefieldinit Tuple`6<T1, T2, T3, T4, T5, T6> extends System.Object implements class System.Collections.IStructuralComparable, class System.Collections.IStructuralEquatable, class System.IComparable
Public Class Tuple(Of T1, T2, T3, T4, T5, T6) Implements IComparable, IStructuralComparable, IStructuralEquatable

generic <typename T1, typename T2, typename T3, typename T4, typename T5, typename T6> public ref class Tuple : IComparable, System::Collections::IStructuralComparable, System::Collections::IStructuralEquatable

summary.span: 表示 6 元组，或六元组。

span.span: Represents a 6-tuple, or sextuple.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 元组是具有特定的数量和值序列的数据结构。A tuple is a data structure that has a specific number and sequence of values. 类表示 6 元组，即具有六个分量的元组。The class represents a 6-tuple, or sextuple, which is a tuple that has six components. 可以实例化对象通过调用或静态方法。You can instantiate a object by calling either the or the static method. 你可以通过使用只读的检索此元组的组件的值， ， ， ， ，和实例属性。You can retrieve the value of the tuple's components by using the read-only , , , , , and instance properties. 元组常用四个不同的方式：Tuples are commonly used in four different ways: - 来表示一组数据。To represent a single set of data. 例如，一个元组可以表示的数据库记录，并且其组件可以表示每个字段的记录。For example, a tuple can represent a database record, and its components can represent individual fields of the record. - 若要提供轻松访问和数据集的操作。To provide easy access to, and manipulation of, a data set. 下面的示例定义包含纽约市从通过 2000年 1960年每次人口普查人口数据的对象。The following example defines a object that contains population data for New York City for each census from 1960 through 2000. 六元组传递给`ComputePopulationChange`方法，以计算年之间两次人口普查，以及整个 50 年内的更改的年度速率的变化率。The sextuple is passed to the `ComputePopulationChange` method, which calculates the annual rate of change between censuses, as well as the annual rate of change for the entire 50 year period. [!code-csharp[System.Tuple\`6.Class#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.tuple`6.class/cs/example1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Tuple\`6.Class#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.tuple`6.class/vb/example1.vb#1)] - 若要通过无需使用方法返回多个值`out`参数 （在 C# 中) 或`ByRef`参数 （在 Visual Basic 中)。To return multiple values from a method without the use of `out` parameters (in C#) or `ByRef` parameters (in Visual Basic). 例如，前面的示例返回城市名称，其计算统计信息中对象。For example, the previous example returns its computed statistics, along with the city name, in a object. - 若要将多个值传递给通过单个参数的方法。To pass multiple values to a method through a single parameter. 例如，方法只有一个参数，你可以提供一个值，则在启动线程执行的方法。For example, the method has a single parameter that lets you supply one value to the method that the thread executes at startup. 如果你提供对象作为方法自变量，则可以提供具有六个项的数据的线程的启动例程。If you supply a object as the method argument, you can supply the thread’s startup routine with six items of data.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 你还可以使用静态方法实例化 6 元组对象，而无需显式指定其组件的类型。You can also use the static method to instantiate a 6-tuple object without having to explicitly specify the types of its components. 下面的示例使用方法可实例化一个 6 元组，其中第一个元素的类型、 剩余元素的类型。The following example uses the method to instantiate a 6-tuple whose first component is of type and whose remaining components are of type . MemberSignature.Value: public override bool Equals (object obj);
.method public hidebysig virtual instance bool Equals(object obj) cil managed
Public Overrides Function Equals (obj As Object) As Boolean
public: override bool Equals(System::Object ^ obj);

param.name: obj
param.span: 与该实例进行比较的对象。

span.span: The object to compare with this instance.

summary.span: 返回一个值，该值指示当前的 对象是否与指定对象相等。

span.span: Returns a value that indicates whether the current object is equal to a specified object.

returns.span: 如果当前实例等于指定对象，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the current instance is equal to the specified object; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks `obj`参数被视为等于当前实例在下列情况下：The `obj` parameter is considered to be equal to the current instance under the following conditions: - 它是对象。It is a object. - 其六个组件是与当前实例相同的类型。Its six components are of the same types as the current instance. - 其六个组件是等于当前实例。Its six components are equal to those of the current instance. 相等性取决于每个组件的默认对象相等比较器。Equality is determined by the default object equality comparer for each component. ## Examples 下面的示例定义包含从人口数据 Los Angeles 和纽约 1960年到 2000年的七的数组。The following example defines an array of sextuples that contain population data for Los Angeles and New York from 1960 to 2000. 每个六元组的第一个分量标识所在的城市。The first component of each sextuple identifies the city. 第一个、 第三个和第四个六元组包含纽约的数据。The first, third, and fourth sextuples contain data for New York. 第一个六元组是第四个六元组的副本。The first sextuple is a duplicate of the fourth sextuple. 第三个六元组而不是"纽约"的"New York City"作为标识所在的城市。The third sextuple identifies the city as "New York City" instead of "New York". 如示例所示，仅第四个六元组等于第一个六元组。As the example shows, only the fourth sextuple is equal to the first sextuple. [!code-csharp[System.Tuple\`6.Equals#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.tuple`6.equals/cs/equals1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Tuple\`6.Equals#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.tuple`6.equals/vb/equals1.vb#1)]

summary.span: 获取当前 对象的第一个分量的值。

span.span: Gets the value of the current object's first component.

value.span: 当前 对象的第一个分量的值。

span.span: The value of the current object's first component.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 你可以动态确定的一种组件在两种方式之一：You can dynamically determine the type of the component in one of two ways: - 通过调用`GetType`方法返回的值属性。By calling the `GetType` method on the value that is returned by the property. - 通过检索对象，表示对象，并返回对数组中检索的第一个元素其方法。By retrieving the object that represents the object, and retrieving the first element from the array that is returned by its method. ## Examples 下面的示例定义一个数组其组件从通过 2000年 1960年包含三个美国城市 （New York、 芝加哥和洛杉矶） 的填充数据的对象。The following example defines an array of objects whose components contain population data for three U.S. cities (New York, Chicago, and Los Angeles) from 1960 through 2000. 然后，它将显示列出的数据的表。It then displays a table that lists the data. 若要显示的城市名称，它将检索的值每个属性对象。To display the city name, it retrieves the value of the property for each object. [!code-csharp[System.Tuple\`6.Item1#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.tuple`6.item1/cs/item1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Tuple\`6.Item1#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.tuple`6.item1/vb/item1.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: int IStructuralComparable.CompareTo (object other, System.Collections.IComparer comparer);
.method hidebysig newslot virtual instance int32 System.Collections.IStructuralComparable.CompareTo(object other, class System.Collections.IComparer comparer) cil managed
Function CompareTo (other As Object, comparer As IComparer) As Integer Implements IStructuralComparable.CompareTo
virtual int System.Collections.IStructuralComparable.CompareTo(System::Object ^ other, System::Collections::IComparer ^ comparer) = System::Collections::IStructuralComparable::CompareTo;

param.name: other
param.span: 要与当前实例进行比较的对象。

span.span: An object to compare with the current instance.

param.name: comparer
param.span: 提供用于比较的自定义规则的对象。

span.span: An object that provides custom rules for comparison.

summary.span: 使用指定的比较器将当前的 对象与指定对象进行比较，并返回一个整数，该整数指示当前对象在排序顺序中的位置是在指定对象之前、之后还是与其相同。

span.span: Compares the current object to a specified object by using a specified comparer and returns an integer that indicates whether the current object is before, after, or in the same position as the specified object in the sort order.

returns.span: 一个带符号整数，指示此实例和 在排序顺序中的相对位置，如下表所示。

span.span: A signed integer that indicates the relative position of this instance and in the sort order, as shown in the following table.

span.description: 此实例在排序顺序中的位置与 相同。
This instance and have the same position in the sort order.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此成员是显式的接口成员实现。This member is an explicit interface member implementation. 它只能在 实例强制转换为 接口时使用。It can be used only when the instance is cast to an interface. 此方法可让你定义的自定义的比较对象。This method lets you define customized comparisons of objects. 例如，可以使用此方法为顺序对象基于特定组件的值。For example, you can use this method to order objects based on the value of a specific component. 虽然可以直接调用此方法，它通常由集合排序方法包括参数集合的成员进行排序。Although this method can be called directly, it is most commonly called by collection-sorting methods that include parameters to order the members of a collection. 例如，它由方法和方法通过实例化的对象构造函数。For example, it is called by the method and the method of a object that is instantiated by using the constructor. > [!CAUTION] > 方法旨在用于排序操作。The method is intended for use in sorting operations. 不是时应使用的比较的主要用途是确定两个对象是否相等。It should not be used when the primary purpose of a comparison is to determine whether two objects are equal. 若要确定两个对象是否相等，请调用方法。To determine whether two objects are equal, call the method. ## Examples 下面的示例创建的数组包含三个从 1960年到 2000年的美国城市的填充数据的对象。The following example creates an array of objects that contains population data for three U.S. cities from 1960 to 2000. 六元组的第一个组件是市/县名。The sextuple's first component is the city name. 剩余的五个组件表示 1960年到 2000年 10 年间隔的人口。The remaining five components represent the population at 10-year intervals from 1960 to 2000. `PopulationComparer`类提供实现，它允许对六元按任一及其组件进行排序数组。The `PopulationComparer` class provides an implementation that allows the array of sextuples to be sorted by any one of its components. 两个值提供给`PopulationComparer`其构造函数中的类： 定义排序顺序中，该组件的位置和一个值，该值指示是否应按升序或降序排序元组对象。Two values are provided to the `PopulationComparer` class in its constructor: The position of the component that defines the sort order, and a value that indicates whether the tuple objects should be sorted in ascending or descending order. 该示例然后显示未排序顺序中的数组中的元素，按第三个组件 （1970 年的人口） 进行排序和显示，然后按第六个分量 （2000 年的人口） 进行排序并显示它们。The example then displays the elements in the array in unsorted order, sorts them by the third component (the population in 1970) and displays them, and then sorts them by the sixth component (the population in 2000) and displays them. [!code-csharp[System.Tuple\`6.CompareTo#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.tuple`6.compareto/cs/compareto2.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Tuple\`6.CompareTo#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.tuple`6.compareto/vb/compareto2.vb#2)]

span.span: is not a object.

MemberSignature.Value: bool IStructuralEquatable.Equals (object other, System.Collections.IEqualityComparer comparer);
.method hidebysig newslot virtual instance bool System.Collections.IStructuralEquatable.Equals(object other, class System.Collections.IEqualityComparer comparer) cil managed
Function Equals (other As Object, comparer As IEqualityComparer) As Boolean Implements IStructuralEquatable.Equals
virtual bool System.Collections.IStructuralEquatable.Equals(System::Object ^ other, System::Collections::IEqualityComparer ^ comparer) = System::Collections::IStructuralEquatable::Equals;

param.name: other

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此成员是显式的接口成员实现。This member is an explicit interface member implementation. 它只能在 实例强制转换为 接口时使用。It can be used only when the instance is cast to an interface. 仅当调用实现`other`不`null`，和可以成功地强制转换 （在 C# 中) 或 （在 Visual Basic 中) 转换为对象的组件与当前实例相同的类型。The implementation is called only if `other` is not `null`, and if it can be successfully cast (in C#) or converted (in Visual Basic) to a object whose components are of the same types as the current instance. 方法第一个传递值对象要进行比较实现。The method first passes the values of the objects to be compared to the implementation. 如果此方法调用返回`true`，再次调用该方法并将其传递这两个值对象。If this method call returns `true`, the method is called again and passed the values of the two objects. 此过程将继续，直到方法调用返回`false`进行比较的特定对`Item`值或两个值传递给方法。This continues until the method call returns `false` when it compares a specific pair of `Item` values, or the two values are passed to the method. ## Examples 下面的示例定义`RateComparer`执行自定义测试相等性的类。The following example defines a `RateComparer` class that performs a custom test for equality. 如果值传递给其方法属于类型或，该方法通过使用只有最多三个小数位数来测试相等性。If the values that are passed to its method are of type or , the method tests for equality by using only up to three fractional digits. 否则，它只需调用`x`参数的`Equals`方法。Otherwise, it simply calls the `x` parameter's `Equals` method. 该示例使用此实现，以确定是否可以使用四个包含率的 1960年和 2000年之间的州的人口变化的数据的对象是否相等。The example uses this implementation to determine whether four objects that contain data on the rate of population change between 1960 and 2000 are equal. [!code-csharp[System.Tuple\`6.Equals#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.tuple`6.equals/cs/equals2.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Tuple\`6.Equals#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.tuple`6.equals/vb/equals2.vb#2)]

Function GetHashCode (comparer As IEqualityComparer) As Integer Implements IStructuralEquatable.GetHashCode
virtual int System.Collections.IStructuralEquatable.GetHashCode(System::Collections::IEqualityComparer ^ comparer) = System::Collections::IStructuralEquatable::GetHashCode;

param.name: comparer
param.span: 一个对象，其 方法计算当前 对象的哈希代码。

span.span: An object whose method calculates the hash code of the current object.

summary.span: 使用指定的计算方法计算当前 对象的哈希代码。

span.span: Calculates the hash code for the current object by using a specified computation method.

returns.span: 32 位有符号整数哈希代码。

span.span: A 32-bit signed integer hash code.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此成员是显式的接口成员实现。This member is an explicit interface member implementation. 它只能在 实例强制转换为 接口时使用。It can be used only when the instance is cast to an interface. 方法只是包装调用`comparer`对象的实现。The method simply wraps a call to the `comparer` object's implementation. 用于计算哈希代码的算法应返回相同的哈希代码的两个被认为是相等的对象。The algorithm used to compute the hash code should return the same hash code for two objects that are considered to be equal.

span.span: Compares the current object to a specified object and returns an integer that indicates whether the current object is before, after, or in the same position as the specified object in the sort order.

returns.span: 一个带符号整数，指示此实例和 在排序顺序中的相对位置，如下表所示。

span.span: A signed integer that indicates the relative position of this instance and in the sort order, as shown in the following table.

span.description: 此实例在排序顺序中的位置与 相同。
This instance and have the same position in the sort order.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此成员是显式的接口成员实现。This member is an explicit interface member implementation. 它只能在 实例强制转换为 接口时使用。It can be used only when the instance is cast to an interface. 此方法提供实现类。This method provides the implementation for the class. 虽然可以直接调用该方法，它通常由集合排序的默认重载方法，如和、 集合的成员进行排序。Although the method can be called directly, it is most commonly called by the default overloads of collection-sorting methods, such as and , to order the members of a collection. > [!CAUTION] > 方法旨在用于排序操作。The method is intended for use in sorting operations. 不是时应使用的比较的主要用途是确定两个对象是否相等。It should not be used when the primary purpose of a comparison is to determine whether two objects are equal. 若要确定两个对象是否相等，请调用方法。To determine whether two objects are equal, call the method. 方法使用的默认对象比较器来比较每个组件。The method uses the default object comparer to compare each component. ## Examples 下面的示例创建的数组包含三个城市美国从 1960年到 2000年填充数据的对象。The following example creates an array of objects that contain population data for three cities in the United States from 1960 to 2000. 六个组件包含从 1960年跟按 10 年的时间间隔的市县的人口数，到 2000年的城市名称。The six components consist of the city name followed by the city's population at 10-year intervals from 1960 to 2000. 该示例的数组未排序顺序中显示的组件的每个元组、 排序数组，，然后调用方法以显示每个元组中的按排序顺序。The example displays the components of each tuple in the array in unsorted order, sorts the array, and then calls the method to display each tuple in sorted order. 该输出显示，已按名称，即第一个组件排序数组。The output shows that the array has been sorted by name, which is the first component. 请注意，该示例不直接调用方法。Note that the example does not directly call the method. 隐式调用此方法数组中每个元素的方法。This method is called implicitly by the method for each element in the array. [!code-csharp[System.Tuple\`6.CompareTo#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.tuple`6.compareto/cs/compareto1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Tuple\`6.CompareTo#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.tuple`6.compareto/vb/compareto1.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 通过此方法返回的字符串的形式 (*Item1*， *Item2*， *Item3*， *Item4*， `Item5, Item6`)，其中*Item1*， *Item2*， *Item3*， *Item4*， *Item5*，和*Item6*表示的值， ， ， ， ，和属性，分别。The string returned by this method takes the form (*Item1*, *Item2*, *Item3*, *Item4*, `Item5, Item6`), where *Item1*, *Item2*, *Item3*, *Item4*, *Item5*, and *Item6* represent the values of the , , , , , and properties, respectively. 如果任何属性值为`null`，它会表示为。If any of the property values is `null`, it is represented as . ## Examples 下面的示例定义包含纽约市从通过 2000年 1960年每次人口普查人口数据的对象。The following example defines a object that contains population data for New York City for each census from 1960 through 2000. 六元组的组件将显示通过调用方法。The components of the sextuple are then displayed by a call to the method.
